content.detailedDescription: In late august of 1994 i was riding back with my mother a close friend after a friday night bowling session we did weekly. as we approached a farm area in between oxford michigan and lapeer michigan i saw an extremely bright area in a field on the east side of the road. i thought there was a football game or some event going on not realizing where we were. the field was completely illuminated at least a hundred yards and as i observed this i noticed a large triangular object. it had 3 bright white lights one on each point of the triangle. in the center there was a dome with a laser like red light in the middle of that. the bottom of the craft was so intricate i could see the metal beam structure that it was made of. the craft was only a 100 feet from the ground and was hovering silently.I was so mesmerized by the object that i didn't make a noise until i realized that no one else was looking. so i started yelling hey look over there what is that? i did not receive a response from anyone in the vehicle and observed they were in some type of trance i shoved my friend and he was almost as stiff as a board.Also my mother who was driving was glued straightforward staring at the road in front of us. at that time i realized we were stopped in the road and there were no other vehicles around us.For the moment i ignored them and paid attention to the object again and watched how it began to turn sideways like an f 16 and stayed hovered on its side for about a few seconds before it shot off instantly at speeds beyond any technology we have and became a dot on the horizon a second later.At that very moment my friend and my mother snapped out of whatever state they were in and started yelling where? where? and i pointed to the horizon in the west sky where the object was now and they sort of shrugged it off and kind of laughed at me.We then continued home and arrived 10 minutes later. i mention the weekly bowling because every friday we would go to the oxford bowling alley for my mother's league. well the next week came around and on our way back that night i witnessed the triangle object higher up in the sky and following me home. this happened for 3 weeks in a row. the last week i saw the object i had a sleepover at my neighbors house. in the middle of the night i woke up to a sound.Everyone was sleeping in the basement that night and i was closest to the stairs. i woke up to see a small 3 foot being creeping down the stairs i became terrified and yelled out i see you! the being peeked through the stair banisters gazing at me before ducking and disappearing out of thin air. my description would be a standard grey alien only a few feet tall large black eyes and long arms. i was so terrified that night that i just close my eyes and went to sleep and tried to forget about it.A couple weeks later i was watching tv and a show called unsolved mysteries was on and the next thing i knew they had a special on the triangle ufo and apparently there were tons of witnesses all throughout the united states all around the same time that i was witnessing my encounter. i also read about the belgian wave and realized that it was the same craft that i saw. only i had a very close encounter with it.To this day i can still remember how clearly i could make out the structure of the object. i never knew where to report such a sighting until i started watching the science channel. all my life i have had multiple encounters with objects but this was the most defying experience
content.summary: Close encounter of triangle ufo witnessed in oxford michigan while driving back to lapeer michigan. i was the only witness since everyone else was in a trance like state.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was playing in front years when i was  probably 12 years old; in miami,  fl
2. i'm not sure what caused me to look up towards the sky
3. i knew they were ufo
4.  i looked to the sky,  and i saw 4 bright lights  high up , very bright,  they  seemed large and round.  they darted back and forth very rapidly then like in the blink of an eye they
all disappeared .
5. i continued looking up but they never returned 
i was afraid to say anything about it.  it's just in recent years that can talk about it.
6. they were moving very fast and just disappeared .  first they hovered back and forth rapidly and they were very bight, and they just disappeared
content.summary: See discription below

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home going in a nw direction on w. waterloo rd in canal winchester ohio around 9:35 in the evening. i witnessed a large low flying object on what looked like a downwards gradual path moving in a westward direction. the object looked like five or six large colorful lights arranged in a crescent shape with two smaller white flashing lights on the top and bottom edge. the lights seemed to be part of the same object but i was not sure of the shape of the object because of my point of view. i might have seen its closer edge from an oblique angle. the object moved in a straight path across a rural yet somewhat busy highway and over a shopping center. as i moved in relation to the object it appeared to stay on a straight path and it was on my right and eventually was in front of my field of vision as i moved in relation to it. as the object was over the area of the shopping center, it appeared to slow or stop moving either because it actually hovered or it appeared to hover because of my point of view in relation to the moving object. it was noticeably large and low but was unclear to what it actually was. i am familiar with many types of aircraft and it didn't seem like anything i had seen before. at first i thought a plane was going down. it was moving about as fast as a normal helicopter but didn't look like a normal helicopter. after i saw the object over the shopping center it was out of my vision for a moment as i had to turn while driving my car and i could not see it again in the area where it had been.
content.summary: The object appeared to be a series of large colorful lights that seemed to be part of the same larger structure. there were also smaller white blinking lights on the top and bottom. very low in a descending direction.

content.detailedDescription: I take many sky photos from my property since i've captured strange things in the past. after taking a ton of photos i noticed what appeared to be a bird in the sky in a north west direction. i took a quick photo and as i lowered the camera it seemed to disappear in a puff. it was dark in color so i figured it was just a bird and i just lost site of it. i didn't think to much of it at the time till i loaded the photos on my laptop and zoomed in on it. i was only able to find one shot of it and i took quite a few shots in that direction. i pretty sure my first impression that it disappeared was right. i personally have caught photo after photo of orbs and other strange things in the sky,i'm positive their is something going on in my next of the woods.I'm just one guy and have a collection of over 40 photos of strange things flying in my area. in the photo if you zoom in to upper center of photo you will see the object.
content.summary: I have captured strange things in sky before so i like to take sky photos when the evening is nice or when i get the urge. on this day i had caught something strange.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
This has happened in wearherford for several nights in a row

bright star-like objects too low to be stars and moving unlike stars.  tracked by planes that were obviously planes moving much faster than the objects. 

bright star-like objects that hover for long periods then move east and then back to the west.  

tried to get closer and follow them but they move every so often.  i cannot get a photo they just turn out like orbs.  

some disappear into the sky and some turn their lights off and just disappear.  some float away very slowly.
content.summary: Many hovering objects with planes flying around them  like they were tracking them. for many nights in a row    at least 10 tonight. they hover for long periods then move forward for miles then back.

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out to do his job at 6:30 pm, they appeared to be in battle between two against one and then one of the two split apart into two objects and continued firing at each other as i retuned into the house. when i took a bag of trash out at about 8{30 pm there was only two objects fighting, i am not sure what happened between the third object and the other two. they may have merged back together again while i was in my house. the objects were darting about the sky and firing beams of lights at each other. they also lowered themselves down when a regular airplane passed over the airplane paid no attention to the other objects in the sky they appeared to be shooting upwards as well as each other.
content.summary: Several objects observed in se sky firing on each other over a period of two hours

content.detailedDescription: It was sunday evening the viking game had just ended my son was 6 years old and wanted to change channels and watch walt disney,we had a picture window facing the lake just when he changed the channel something come from the north over the lake,my son said what is that dad i said i'm not sure.I called for my wife she was in the kitchen i told her what i saw looked out at the lake and did not see it.She said look up there i glanced up and told her i was going to get the camera she got scared and closed the drapes and did not want me to go outside.We called the police station they had not received any reports,we had a small airport they had saw nothing but they were 17 miles away.I was stationed at miramar navy airbase 1962&1963 worked around all types of aircraft never have i saw anything like this i am getting older wanted to tell someone else my wife and i still talk about it ever once in awhile i know whati saw sometimes people laugh and sometimes they listen.
content.summary: Metallic in color my wife got scared

content.detailedDescription:
Walked out to driveway at 2am to start car to charge my battery (having battery charge problems).
as i was walking to car i saw a small orb that was slightly larger than venus but looked more like an orb of light rather than a typical "star".  was slightly below where all the stars were in the night sky, including the actual venus(or one of the planets). i stopped at my car and i was facing the door. i noticed the light was moving at a steady pace, not fast but similar to airplane speed. the object was parallel to my front hood and moving at an angle to the right, towards the back of my car. it was high up, around the level of helicopters or small planes.
as i watched it move i started out facing my car door with my head turned a bit to the left. object moved left to right. in about 10 seconds i had turned 90 degrees and my left shoulder was now next to the car door in order to keep the object in front of me.

at this point it stopped and hovered for about 1 second and then began moving directly towards me so that it would fly directly overhead. so it made an almost 90 degree turn.

it's movement was fairly smooth and there was no sound whatsoever.
it's very quiet in town at 2am, no cars, no noise. it was a clear night with a bright moon and freezing cold, no real wind and about 8 degrees. planes and helicopters do often fly in my line of sight and no matter what their height is i can always hear them and quickly identify them. at night i usually check out the sky as i'm into cosmology.

as it was moving towards a direct fly-over i couldn't help but to get creeped out as everyone was asleep, lights out and it was dead quiet. i did not expect it to suddenly veer off it's course and come right at me.
so i turned around and quickly walked inside.
i tried to see it out my window but could not locate it that way and when i went outside a few minutes later with binoculars it was gone.

even before it changed direction it was very odd, a source of light that was very baffling. no blinking. it was immediately very out of place in the sky. in the summer i watch the sky on clear days just for stargazing so i am familiar with what's usually there.
content.summary: Small orb, slightly larger than jupiter usually is. moving slow/medium across sky. abrupt stop and direction change.

content.detailedDescription: This event was like nothing else i have ever experienced. i was staying at a secluded farm at the time with my boyfriend and some friends, we were just hanging out and throwing sticks for the dogs, and although it was late it was light out because we were in an elevated mountain area and the stars were bright. at one point i walked over to the side of the property overlooking the wooded valley area, to look at the view of the beautiful mountains in the north. what made me notice the lights was simply the fact that they were there, first one pretty far away although it was hard to tell in the dark. it was bright blue, like the blue of an led light but dancing around so quickly and spritely that it could never have been human. it looked like it was running around on the air around 100 feet from me, so i couldn't have caught up to it in the wooded area. i had no idea what it was, my mind couldn't think of anything that made sense. then there was another one, but it could have been the same one,i don't know. i never saw both at once but it felt like it was a different one. they both moved the same but were about 50 feet apart, but both in the wooded area. they hopped and danced around as if someone was swinging a light around but very fast and at all different heights, sometimes faster and sometimes not. i strongly felt like they were something i wish other people saw, and i wanted an explanation for these strange lights. but i couldn't think of anything. i lost sight of the objects because i think i was calling to my friends to come see them and i just lost my attention for a minute, or something else happened that distracted me, i don't remember. maybe one of the dogs ran into that wooded area and scared them off.
content.summary: Two wobbling, glowing blue lights dancing quickly around a few feet from the ground, then soaring up higher than a human could reach

content.detailedDescription:
Same as above

they come alot over the past 5 years 

we know to open our hearts to all humanity and not be afraid so we will not hurt them

they are just like us , human beings of another place
content.summary: Starship comes in sw sky then turns from white to candle colored and emits red and green , then w sky descending to treeline , they know we are here

content.detailedDescription: While sliding in the snow in the backyard, my son started looking at the stars. at precisely 18:05 he pointed to a moving star. i first thought it was a plane. but then i saw a very faint blue object (same size as a moving satellite) in front of it. both objects did not make any noises what so ever. the white object was the same size as the north star. both objects kept the exact same distance between them as they crossed the sky from west to east. they appeared to be higher than commercial jet flights, but the white light was too large for a satellite/space station type object. both moved slower than a commercial jet, at about the speed of a slow moving cessna. it was strange seeing the blue satellite like object in an exactly straight line in front of the white object. the distance between the two appeared to be between 4 and 5 cm (when looking at a satellite), meaning a fairly good distance at that height i suppose. then 10 minutes later (18:15) a helicopter flew in the exact same trajectory and it seemed to be at a higher altitude than i normally see helicopters. it also sounded like a newer type model (less noise making than traditional military black helicopters). what i found strange is that after it was quite past us to the east, it all of a sudden started having a strange red flashing light pattern: long flash, short flash. it continued with that light flashing pattern until i lost view of it. then at 18:25, we saw another helicopter, this one was somewhat lower in altitude and sounded like the typical military type helicopter, again, flying in the same trajectory. i have seen many times satellites fly in the night sky, including the space station, as well as commercial planes, but this was quite different. no noise. no flashing lights. what are the chances of seeing a small blue star followed by a large white start, both in a perfect straight line, both keeping the exact same distance between them, yet flying slower than commercial airplanes (and much slower than satellites do). and 2 helicopters? i figure it's the military that sent them to persuade people that they saw helicopters, not moving ufos.
content.summary: Blue and white moving stars followed by 2 helicopters

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a mid day nap, i woke up around 6"45pm went outside to smoke a cigarette i looked up in he sky it the area ssw far be on the tree tops and noticed the brite lite, that was around 6:58pm. i came back inside to grab my camera it seem to change directions within 5 minutes too w it was around 7:09 i went back out side where i saw the like and notice that it seem to be distanced a far now i'm sorry i don't have the right gear too have taken a picture of it. i'm going back outside right now its 7:50pm well it seems to took off or its hiding in the clouds but the brite light that i saw is no longer there.7:53pm
content.summary: I went outside to smoke looked up into the sky ssw and noticed this brite lite there wasn't even a star in the sky yet, and it seem to move from where i saw it in the distancewithin 5mins apart

content.detailedDescription: I'll let you decide what you think this is, it's not a bird or a plane, it moves so fast it's imposible to see with your eyes. 9 to 10 seconds on the lower right side of the video you will see a streak from right to the upper left side.
content.summary: I got video and photos

content.detailedDescription: Driving in car, noticed very odd, two green non flashing lights, in area where planes approach and depart cle...Planes also in general area, this was definitely not a plane. as i turned and parked, lights switched from green to red...Object ascended further, hovered, then descended quickly (straight down) before disappearing below the tree line. total time approximately three to four minutes.
content.summary: Two green non pulsing lights, switched to red. object hovered for minutes, then quickly descended before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on sarah deel rd. by the time i pulled over (about two minutes time tops to pull over). the incident was uncanny to the 'lights over the white house' incident!
content.summary: Saw them flying in formulation towards johnson space center

content.detailedDescription:
A few years ago, about 2013, i was in a car with a relative. i was sitting passenger seat. i had just got done with a tae kwon do class. we live in a wooded neighborhood a few miles away from the town.

going to our house, there are a lot of farms. at this time of year, most of the farmers had harvested their crops. in this case, it was corn. driving on these side roads, the woman i am in the car with and i spot a glowing light hovering above the tree line. we debate if it's a helicopter or a plane. it looks very far away. we then lose sight of it and forget about it. a few seconds later(about 10?) i look out the passenger window.

i see a u.F.O, plain and simple. there is no mistaking what i saw. as i could remember the details clearly in my head till this day, two years later.

i stood glaring at the u.F.O, in amazement. this may have been for about 15 seconds, glaring at it. about 50 feet away, 20-30 feet off the ground was a silver-metallic disc-shape hovering-in-place object. it looked like the stereotypical u.F.O. you would see on movies or cartoons.

one thing different from the stereotypical flying disc is where people presume the glass was on cartoons or shows, it was purely metallic. same color as the rest of the u.F.O. however, i could tell it was rotating in circles. it was very bright, however not to bright for me to make it out. there were 6 light panels in all. 3 on each side. i think they were rectangular or pure square.

this sighting amazed me. it stayed on my mind ever since. i wanted to report it, so i found this site and am doing it now. alas, i have no physical evidence. only the witness of i and the driver. even worse is that she did not see it like i did. but, given the chance, i would gladly take a polygraph test and/or go under hypnosis.

i thought the least i could do is make a quick sketch of it. it looks a bit different than it actually was, though. my sketch makes it look bigger on top, when in reality the bottom and the top of the saucer were almost equal. please excuse the lighting, the good picture wouldn't import.
content.summary: Ufo hovering extremely close to car over shaven cornfield.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my partner were in our local church yard/park and i took a picture on my phone camera of him and the dog, it wasn't till i got home later on and i loaded it on to my computer that i noticed there was something in the sky in the picture, i zoomed in on it and could not identify it as a flying bird or something else and it has puzzeled me since so i thought i would contact you to see if you thought it was a ufo or not.
content.summary: Unidentified flying object only noticed in the photograph later on

content.detailedDescription:
Witness was out side with dog and looked up to the east and saw blue sky with a few white clouds. witness saw a  brilliant white star like object moving in the sky from east to west, high above aircraft. witness 
grabbed his camera phone to take pictures and as it neared he observed it was cylinder shaped, pointy in front and back. as it moved toward the west, it didn't look real, it looked surreal.
content.summary: Brighter than white  a bullet shaped object  moved fast across the sky

content.detailedDescription: It started in 2010 might not be able to type much they are manipulating my  phone and mind right now. i started hearing music first then talk of a war coming to earth.Some say they are from the future and know of the war.John sanders,randyrandy and mmicheal armstrong could be some of them. i beleive my mind has been used by them for spiritual warfare, and i have battled with it also against the ones that hurt and bother me.There are between 3 and 15 craft in the atmosphere over borger at any given time.They have told me that the hubble crashed on sindars planet killing 15000 of them and that they are coming very soon to wage war against uš.Bbringing withe them a peice of the wreckage and going to throw it at the whitehouse. .They are messing with my phone so bad right now that u cant see what im typing. i sent an e-mail to nasa 2 days ago and have to stop now. please contact me at [phone numbers removed/cms/tg].:
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Still here bothering me with beams,sspirits and weird energy as of 2.10.2015.Sent nasa e-mail.

content.detailedDescription:
My family (wife and daughter) and i were outside on saturday night 31 january 2015. it was a clear night. i looked into the sky to watch the stars when i notices 3 stars in a triangular formation. these stars were not the same as the others. the other stars were white normal stars. the 3 stars were slightly orange in color. suddenly one of the stars left the triangular formation and moved quickly horizontally outwards in a straight line for about 200 meters (or more)  and suddenly stopped and waited for about 3 seconds. it then moved into space vertically until it became smaller and could not be seen clearly. the other 2 orange colored stars next to it did not move. 

about a week before the incident i looked out my upstairs window and noticed an orange colored light object slightly flickering travelling towards the sky. the object was just above my house. it moved slowly yet steadily straight up towards the stars until it looked like one of the stars in space. the object was about the size of a soccer ball. the sky was also clear on that night with just a few clouds. 

my wife, daughter and i witnessed both events. the slightly orange coloured stars in the area above my house are  not there anymore. the remaining 2 orange stars have disappeared.  that area is clear.  the surrounding area has the normal white stars. there was no trail of light such as a rocket emitted from both sightings. 

in my opinion the objects next to the stars looked like it could have been a camouflage/disguise to appear as stars.

thank you
content.summary: My family and i witnessed a strange movement of objects next to the stars.

content.detailedDescription:
During my spring break of 1977 my family and three other families from the neighborhood i grew up in traveled to a holiday inn in navarre beach.  my mother had told me it was a newly opened hotel.  it had an indoor pool, arcade, gift shop, deli, and small movie theatre.  for its day it was considered to be a very nice place and my family went to this hotel three times. during our second visit in august of 1977 the film jaws ii was being filmed at navarre and i even got to see the mechanical jaws stored with other movie equipment and props in the eastern portion of the hotel parking lot. 

during this spring break vacation around late march of 1977 there was a special showing of the film bugsy malone where only children were permitted to attend.  it was during the film that i started to feel a bit disoriented.  i heard some other children crying and i heard the sound of someone throwing up.  at one point in the film i got up from my chair to leave, but i was quickly escorted back to my chair by an usher in a black suit and black hat.  i saw one or maybe two more men in black suits at the back of the theatre. after the film was over i felt just fine and i never did complain to anyone about that experience.  

one evening on this vacation i awoke and sat up in my bed.  i looked across the room and could see a group of small figures in the dimly lit room.  my brother was asleep to my right and my parents were asleep in the bed to my left.  the feeling i felt was something i had felt before which i immediately recognized.  it was a feeling i only have felt when the greys were near.   i thought “its been a while.” and to a young boy about to turn 7 it had been over 2 years since his last encounter with the greys.  so it had felt like a long time.  but then i could not move and one of the figures moved towards me very fast and the last thing i recalled were its big black eyes very close to my face and a wand like object being pointed at me.  then there was blackness.  the next thing i recall was being in the sand dunes away from the hotel in a circle of children. i must have been one of the youngest because i was the shortest.  but my attention was more on the blue object directly over us that had a glowing blue light all about it.  the closest thing i’ve seen to this shade of blue would be that of the blue glow of cherenkov radiation that i’ve only seen from photos.  then there was blackness.  the next morning was a saturday, and i was watching cartoons.  it was not till i was watching tv that i then recalled that nights experience with the greys and of seeing the blue glowing sphere above me and the other children.  i then told one of the other children that were traveling with us on this trip about my experience that night and she did not believe me.  i also recall walking around the hotel later that day and then getting up the nerve to tell my older brother who also teased me.
content.summary: Grey alien abduction of children at navarre beach florida

content.detailedDescription:
i had parked my motorcycle at the back of a petrol station having a cigarette.  i looked out over the estuary and noticed 500 feet in front of me, hovering just above the water line, a large group of about 14 rectangular pulsating lights, brighter than strobes, going from left to right or anticlockwise in what's described as the "marquee fashion".  so as one light goes to the right the next one follows from the left. the object was if held at arms length was six inches.  and whatever this object was it was perfectly flat on the bottom and never disturbed the water even though it was inches above it.  it also didn't appear to curve at the edges.  i was trying to weigh up if it was circular. 

my thoughts at this time, i actually said out loud "oh look a flying saucer".  i laughed and then i began to think what am i looking at?  was it a  helicopter?  there was no  noise and this was inches above the water.  there was no disturbance to the water whatsoever as the lights gave a huge reflection in the water just under the object.  was it a boat with fishermen using some sort of lighted fishing nets?  it was not a hot air balloon, it wasn't a light aircraft.  i thought of everything that it could've been.  so i decided i would drive to a position nearer to it.  i drove my bike to the headland (1 minute drive away).  switched the bike off, no helmet on my head, i proceeded to view this object on my right and still hovering over the water below me.  i had now viewed the object for 15 minutes.  

as i watched it there was no sound whatsoever, no air disturbance, just this bank of bright lights with its flashing pattern.  then it started to move towards me and began to rise very slowly up  in front of me.  this is when i was now about 25 foot away from it.  it rose up at a 30 degree angle.  just before it drew level with me i flashed my motorcycle lights directly at it three times.  i then thought do i really want to get involved in this?  so i stopped flashing my lights and watched this huge thing slowly meander up the valley.  

it was a clear winters night, at teatime, around christmas time and there was no other vehicles present during this time!

i didn't report the sighting due to my friend saying it was a plane from walney island or a hot air balloon from holker hall and wouldn't have another word said about it.  i took the hint and kept it to myself but never forgot the experience and i still don't know what it was to this day.

a few weeks later my mother showed me a local paper (westmorland gazette) reporting that two nuclear physicists from backbarrow, which is at the top of the same valley, on the same day, at 5.45 p.M. they witnessed the same thing as i had.  i managed to speak to them at the time on the telephone and he had said he had never seen lights so bright and in the same pattern as i had seen.  both of them said they thought they would never see anything like that again and we left it at that.

my own thoughts, i was never interested in the subject of ufos but after this i bought every book possible to see if there was any reports of a similar nature to what i had seen.  i know it wasn't a plane, or a helicopter, or anything that seemed to make rational sense.  

sellafield, the nuclear reprocessing plant is just a few miles away and i think that this thing was taking water samples.  but my big question is why did they leave the lights on if they had been switched off i would never have witnessed them.
content.summary: Watched rapid moving anti clockwise rectangular bright lights hovering over water at close range for 20 minutes then they departed

content.detailedDescription: driving east on i-70 at 75mph around 10:30pm on 2-8-15 approximately 1 mile from toll booth, i saw a large round object that was split in half horizontally red/orange in color it did not move then it slowly blacked out (as if you lowered a window blind)it looked to be above the trees and under the clouds. i would guess it around a mile southeast of my view it was very large. after it blacked out 3 minutes later a very fast moving plane came into the area made a loop around then went in a southeast direction.I thought it to be odd that when the car full of people i was in started to really talk about the object pointing and what not it started to go black. from start finish i saw the object for about five minutes.
content.summary: Driving east on i-70 at 75mph approximately 1 mile from toll booth, i saw a large round object that was split in half horizontally red/orange in color it did not move then it blacked out

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading toward blue ridge blvd on sycamore ter, and off to my left
(sw), i saw a bright light like a streetlight, but too far up, moving
strangely, and blinking as if it was a star about to die. so, i got my phone
out and started recording. at first, i couldn't see it, then it suddenly
appeared again. it look like the object i first saw was absorbing the other
misty like object. i remember thinking the object/light that did the
"absorbing" reminded me of a dreidel.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange object absorbing? an orb/light?

content.detailedDescription: my girlfriend & i were leaving her apartment complex, she was driving & i was riding passenger, when before even leaving the complex parking lot we noticed these lights flying over head coming in our direction. we witnessed them coming towards us & i asked her what they were. not knowing but very curious she stopped the car & we both got out to observe the objects. we observed 7 objects all together fly directly overhead of us in a straight line , one after another, until they flew out of sight. the first five objects were going pretty fast and about the same speed. following them though at a bit of a slower more lagging speed were two more objects of the same origin. the difference though in the first five objects and the last two is the color varied from orange i the first five top the following two being more of a yellow cole. the objects almost just resembled lie a glowing orb or star but that was low abd flying following one another. i honestly have no idea what they were.
content.summary: Was leaving girlfriends apartment with girlfriend when we noticed 7 objects flying that came right over head and continued until our of sight

content.detailedDescription:
dos testigos circulaban en un coche por la autopista a67, desde la localidad de osorno en palencia, desde donde ya era visible con direcciã³n al norte, una luz intensa que inicialmente parecã­a una estrella. no le dimos mã¡s importancia hasta que a la altura de la localidad de mataporquera en cantabria, se convirtieron en tres luces en distintas posiciones dentro de la nube, paramos el coche y nos bajamos en una localidad prã³xima a mataporquera que se llama hormiguera.
ya eran siete las que contamos desde fuera del coche. saquã© una foto (de noche, infructuosamente)que adjunto a esta informaciã³n. cuã¡ndo hablã© con el otro testigo de avisar a gente de un bar cercano del pueblo, se apagaron todas las luces al mismo tiempo. la nube de forma aparentemente lenticular parecã­a desplazarse hacia el este.
instintivamente movã­ el dial de la radio, localizando en la fm en posiciones bajas un sonido gutural continuado extraã±o.(no estoy seguro que la fuente fuese la nube).
content.summary: 1 luz intensa en una nube de unos 5 km de longitud se convirtio en 3 y posteriormente en 7 apagadas todas al mismo tiempo.

content.detailedDescription:
Photo no 1 - excursion mountains bjelasnica near sarajevo. above the mountains looming something like ufo.Photo n'o 2 was taken a few minutes after the object is much higher. i was wondering  if this is about something unusual, it is a conventional aircraft would not be appearing in the photograph number 2 but would for those few minutes later than the photograph number 1 should disappear should underline your  professional response best regards from sarajevo.

the object facility is noticed after viewing photos

content.detailedDescription: My yougess daughter was bugging me to go and play on the trapoline out side ,,,after awhile she became tired so we bought laid back on the trampoline and was looking at the stars ,,,and there was a spot that there was light and then this flash of light comes out of nowhere and takes off just like star trek ,,it whent strate and then all of sudent it goes on a 45 degree angle and disrpears out of sight and then some planes apesrs ,,,,,
content.summary: It was like a the star trek movie,,,my younger daughter and i was looking up and all of a sudent a bright light shoot in a starth line i tough it was a star but all of a sudent ir when in a 45 dargree angle in a flash ,,and few airplanes apeared ,,,,

content.detailedDescription:
Watching tv when an advertisement came on so grabbed a cigarette and went out on the balcony of my 2nd floor apartment. looking out over mountains (lizard range) i noticed a dull light hovering. first i thought a helicopter but then realised no sound. took my glasses off, blinked, cleaned glasses on t shirt and looked again and it was still there. after about 20 seconds it rose higher and then shot off west at very high speed till i lost sight of it.
at first i thought i was seeing things, then i started to think, no, it was definitely something. after coming inside i started to feel a bit spooked.
jumped on the internet and searched ufo sightings and came across this website.
content.summary: Grey oval hovered then ascended and changed direction abruptly

content.detailedDescription: We were leaving brixx pizza in mayfair shopping center in wilmington, i took my phone out to take a picture of the bright peach colored moon. i put my hand out of the window to snap the picture but when i focused in i could see something moving across the sky, it flew right over the moon! i did not wait, i snapped the picture and caught it!!!
content.summary: I was going to take a picture of the moon and as soon as i saw the craft i took the picture and caught it!
